description: The engine left the tracks and apparently hit a freight wagon before running into a building.
title: Italy train crash: Two dead in high-speed derailment
title_page: Italy train crash: Two dead in high-speed derailment - BBC News
maintext: The BBC's Mark Lowen in Rome says that while there have been occasional crashes on Italy's regional trains, this is the first such incident on its high-speed Frecciarossa - or Red Arrow - network, the country's transport pride.
